DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety electroacupuncture （EA） simple female stress urinary incontinence .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Electroacupuncture Simple Female Stress Urinary incontinence-a Multicenter Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) common disease female . The inconvenience cause SUI affect patient ' quality life health seriously . To date , specific therapy SUI . Former research show acupuncture may work SUI . This multi-center randomized control clinical trial acupuncture simple female stress urinary incontinence design confirm efficacy safety EA . This project conduct Chinese researcher , support Chinese Government . The research result expect provide high quality evidence EA simple female stress urinary incontinence .
DOC.criteria: Meet diagnosis Simple female stress urinary incontinence 4075 year old Volunteered join research sign informed consent urge urinary incontinence , mixed urinary incontinence , overflow urinary incontinence , etc After operation urinary incontinence pelvic floor operation Edeoptosis≥Degree 2 Symptomatic urinary tract infection RUV > 30ml Qmax < 20ml/s Constrained movement walking , stairs climb , run Patients continuous treatment stress urinary incontinence medicine bladder function With serious cardiovascular , cerebral , liver , kidney , psychiatric disease , diabetes , MSA , Injury cauda equine , myeleterosis . During pregnancy lactation period With cardiac pacemaker , Metal allergy severe needle phobia
